casebody.data:
DAVIDSON COUNTY BROADCASTING COMPANY, INC., et al.
v.
IREDELL COUNTY, et al. 314P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Allegra Collins, Attorney at Law, for Davidson County Broadcasting Company, Inc., et al. Lisa Valdez, Attorney at Law, Alex M. Graziano, Attorney at Law, Statesville, for Iredell County. Thomas E. Terrell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for McConnell, Wayne, et al. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, S. Wilson Quick, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Broadcasters.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 5th of December 2016 by NC Association of Broadcasters for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
